Record.ClassificationPath: Biological_Process_Kind/Biological Process/Pathologic Process/Pathogenesis/Viral Pathogenesis/Pathogenesis of HIV Neurological Disease
Record.Description: Elucidate the pathogenic mechanisms involved in HIV-associated neurological diseases and neurobehavioral dysfunction. Enhance a bidirectional flow between basic and clinical observations and intervention programs on HIV-related complications and foster interdisciplinary collaborations.
